com.github.dm.jrt.android.channel.io

Class ParcelableByteChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.android.channel.io.ParcelableByteChannel

  • public class ParcelableByteChannel
extends Object
    Utility class focused on the optimization of the transfer of byte chunks through routine channels.

    For example, an invocation writing bytes can be implemented as: 

    
 public void onInput(final IN in, final Channel<ParcelableByteChunk, ?> result) {
   ...
   final ChunkOutputStream outputStream = ParcelableByteChannel.withOutput(result)
                                                                .buildOutputStream();
   ...
 }

    While an invocation reading them: 

    
 public void onInput(final ParcelableByteChunk chunk, final Channel<OUT, ?> result) {
   ...
   final ChunkInputStream getInputStream = ParcelableByteChannel.getInputStream(chunk);
   ...
 }
    The generated chunks implement the parcelable interface.
    Note that the streams used to write into and read from chunks should be properly closed as the Java best practices suggest.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 09/03/2015.

      static class  ParcelableByteChannel.ParcelableByteChunk

    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        @NotNull
public static com.github.dm.jrt.channel.io.ByteChannel.ChunkInputStream getInputStream(@NotNull
                                                                                                ParcelableByteChannel.ParcelableByteChunk... chunks)
        Creates an input stream returning the concatenation of the data contained in the specified chunks.

        Note that only one input stream can be created for each chunk.

        Parameters:
        chunks - the byte chunks whose data have to be concatenated.
        Returns:
        the input stream.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if an input stream has been already created for one of the specified chunks.

      • withOutput

        @NotNull
public static com.github.dm.jrt.channel.io.ChunkOutputStreamBuilder withOutput(@NotNull
                                                                                        com.github.dm.jrt.core.channel.Channel<? super ParcelableByteChannel.ParcelableByteChunk,?> channel)
        Returns a builder of chunk output streams.
        Since the byte chunks generated by the channel are likely to be part of a remote procedure call, be aware of the limits imposed by the Android OS architecture when choosing a specific chunk size (see TransactionTooLargeException).

        The built streams will not close the underlying channel by default.

        Parameters:
        channel - the output channel to feed with data.
        Returns:
        the output stream builder.
